channel.title: Theology on Bulletin
channel.description: Recent content in Theology on Bulletin

item.title: Love and Responsibility
item.description: We have a duty to love one another. Surrendering oneself to another.

item.title: Prayer of Surrender
item.description: Lord Jesus Christ, take all my freedom, my understanding, and my will. All that I have and cherish you have given to me. I surrender it all to be guided by your will. Your love and your grace are wealth enough for me. Give me these, Lord Jesus, and I ask for nothing more. Amen.
